```
page:
    layout: portrait
    margin: [0.75in, 1in, 0.75in, 1in]
    size: A4
```

```
header:
  height: 0.5in
  line_height: 1
  recto_content:
    center: '{document-title}'
  verso_content:
    center: '{document-title}'

footer:
  height: 0.5in
  line_height: 1
  recto_content:
    right: '{chapter-title} | *{page-number}*'
  verso_content:
    left: '*{page-number}* | {chapter-title}
```
